definitions.definition: What, of those mentioned or implied.
examples: They couldn't decide which song to play.
Show me which one is bigger.
You may go which way you please.
He once owned a painting of the house, which painting would later be stolen.
She only speaks Chinese, which language I can hardly follow.
For several seconds he sat in silence, during which time the tea and sandwiches arrived.
I'm thinking of getting a new car, in which case I'd get a red one.

main_definition: ( interrogative ) What, of those mentioned or implied.
secondary_definitions: ( relative , formal outside certain phrases ) Designates the one(s) previously mentioned.
